title: Job Openings at Havana Group
content:
Havana Group has a number of companies under its porfolio. We're into real estate, media, technology and hospitality. You will enjoy working with us if you're a talented young, vibrant, energetic, creativeand ambitious individual who wants to work with a team of other champions, in an environment that sponsors growth and development. If you're not intimidated with greatness, you're welcome to join our team.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Corporate Sales Marketer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Havana Group of Companies is expanding, and we are seeking strategic, professional Sales Marketers to join our team in Lagos.
	You will be responsible for identifying potential corporate and institutional clients, creating relationships, and actively generating leads that convert into service subscriptions.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify, visit, and engage decision-makers in targeted organizations across Lagos.
	Pitch our services professionally and persuasively, tailoring solutions to each client’s operational needs.
	Generate qualified leads and follow through with the sales team for conversion.
	Maintain accurate records of outreach, leads, and feedback using provided tools.
	Represent Havana Group with integrity and professionalism in all business interactions.
	Collaborate with the internal team to refine sales strategy based on feedback from the field.


Requirements


	Minimum of 2 years of experience in sales, B2B marketing, or field business development.
	Proven ability to engage and close business with structured organizations.
	Strong presentation and communication skills.
	Self-motivated, persuasive, and results-driven.
	Must reside in Lagos and be familiar with key commercial areas.
	Experience in facility services, property management, or corporate sales is a plus.


Salary
N70,000 - N100,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 31st August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.9figuremedia@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Graphic Designer

Job Location: Enugu 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Creating visual concepts for marketing materials, social media, websites, and other digital/print platforms.
	Work closely with other team members to develop design solutions that align with project objectives.
	Design engaging graphics, illustrations, and layouts for advertisements, brochures, flyers, banners, and other promotional materials.
	Update and maintain brand guidelines to ensure consistency across all creative outputs.
	Prepare design files for print and digital use, ensuring accurate formatting and resolution.
	Stay updated on industry trends and design techniques to keep the company's visual assets fresh and current.
	Collaborate with the marketing and content teams to produce visually appealing content for campaigns.
	Stay updated on industry trends and design techniques to keep the company's visual assets fresh and current.
	Handle multiple design projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
	Take feedback from supervisors to refine and improve designs.
	Support the development of creative concepts for client presentations and internal projects.


Preferred Qualifications


	Degree or Diploma in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
	Basic knowledge of web design (HTML/CSS) is a plus.
	Experience in video editing or animation tools is a bonus.


Requirements:


	2 - 3 years of proven experience as a graphic designer or relevant role (internships and freelance projects count).
	Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
	Basic knowledge of typography, color theory, and layout design principles.
	Strong portfolio showcasing a variety of design projects (submit link with application).
	Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks effectively.
	Good communication skills and a willingness to learn and take direction.
	Attention to detail and commitment to high-quality work.
	Time-management skills with the ability to meet deadlines.


Salary
N75,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 16th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.9figuremedia@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	Ensure your resume includes relevant work experience and educational background.
	Portfolio: Attach a link to your portfolio showcasing your design work.
	Applications without portfolios will not be considered.
	Cover Letter: Include a brief cover letter detailing your experience, why you're interested in this role, and how your skills align with the job requirements.


 

3.) Content Developer

Job Location: Enugu
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a skilled Content Developer to lead website content production, SEO optimization, social media management, link building, and community building.


Responsibilities


	Create and manage engaging content for our website, including landing pages, blog posts, and lead magnets.
	Optimize content for SEO to improve search rankings and increase organic traffic.
	Collaborate closely with the head of content, SEO experts, designers, and front-end developers.
	Monitor content performance and adapt strategies to improve engagement and conversions.
	Contribute to social media management and community-building efforts.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, English, or a related field with proven experience as a content developer or similar role.
	Proficiency in content management systems (CMS) like WordPress.
	Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
	Ability to conduct thorough research and create compelling, engaging content.
	Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.
	Strong content writing skills with a knack for storytelling and engaging narratives.
	Basic knowledge of SEO best practices and content marketing strategies.
	A keen eye for analytics to measure and enhance content performance.
	Proficiency in content management software and tools.
	A curious, research-driven mindset with a strong sense of ownership and autonomy.
	The ability to thrive in a collaborative environment that values mutual respect and equality.


Salary
N75,000 - N150,000 per month. 

Benefits:


	Competitive salary.
	Professional development opportunities.
	Collaborative and innovative work environment.
	Experience with HTML, CSS, and basic web development.
	Knowledge of graphic design tools like Adobe Creative Suite.
	Understanding of social media marketing and how it integrates with content strategy


Application Closing Date: 16th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.9figuremedia@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Ensure your resume includes relevant work experience and educational background.

 

4.) WordPress Expert

Job Location: Enugu 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Build and customize advanced WordPress websites, including bespoke themes, plugins, and functionalities tailored to client needs.
	Optimize websites for SEO, speed, and responsiveness across all devices and platforms.
	Integrate advanced third-party tools and APIs (e.g., CRM, analytics, or marketing automation platforms).
	Troubleshoot complex technical issues, including performance bottlenecks, security vulnerabilities, and compatibility challenges.
	Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs and ensure brand consistency.
	Maintain and update client websites, ensuring compliance with the latest WordPress standards and security protocols.
	Provide technical guidance and recommendations to enhance website functionality and user experience.


Requirements


	3+ years of advanced WordPress development experience.
	Expert-level proficiency in PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL.
	Extensive experience in custom theme and plugin development, including REST API integrations.
	Strong knowledge of SEO, web accessibility (WCAG), and performance optimization techniques.
	Proven ability to troubleshoot and resolve complex WordPress issues.
	Excellent collaboration and communication skills to work in a fast-paced agency environment.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Expertise with popular page builders and frameworks like Gutenberg.
	Familiarity with hosting environments and server-side management.
	Experience with design tools for seamless collaboration with creative teams.
	Knowledge of digital marketing tools and strategies (e.g., Google Analytics, marketing automation).


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 / month. 

Application Closing Date: 16th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.9figuremedia@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: 

Job Summary


	The CTO is responsible for providing strategic and technical leadership across all aspects of technology development and implementation.
	You will oversee the software development process, from project initiation to delivery, ensuring adherence to best practices, quality standards, and timelines.
	Additionally, you will lead the recruitment, training, and development of technical talent, foster a culture of innovation, and drive continuous improvement initiatives.


Scope and Impact


	As the Chief Technology Officer (CTO), the incumbent will play a pivotal role in shaping the technological direction of the company, driving innovation, and ensuring the successful delivery of software solutions.
	They will lead a team of software developers and engineers, oversee projects, and collaborate with stakeholders to deliver high-quality software products that meet business objectives.


Duties &amp; Responsibilities


	Strategic Technology Leadership: Develop and execute the company&#39;s technology strategy in alignment with business goals and industry trends. Identify opportunities for technological innovation and drive initiatives to enhance competitive advantage.
	Team Management: Lead and mentor a team of technology professionals, including software developers, engineers, and IT specialists. Foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning within the technology team.
	Product Development and Innovation: Oversee the development and enhancement of software products and solutions tailored to the finance industry&#39;s specific needs. Drive innovation initiatives to explore new technologies, improve existing products, and create new revenue streams.
	Architecture and Infrastructure: Define and maintain the company&#39;s technology architecture and infrastructure, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security. Evaluate and recommend appropriate technologies, platforms, and tools to support business objectives.
	Code Review and Quality Assurance: Conduct regular code reviews to ensure adherence to coding standards, maintain code quality, and identify areas for improvement. Implement and oversee quality assurance processes.
	Technical Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation, including system architecture, design documents, and user guides. Ensure that documentation is accurate, up to date, and easily accessible.
	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards governing financial technology, data privacy, and cybersecurity. Implement robust security measures and risk management practices to safeguard sensitive information and mitigate potential threats.
	Stakeholder Collaboration: Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including executive leadership, product management, sales, and operations, to align technology initiatives with business priorities. Communicate effectively with external stakeholders, including clients, partners, regulators, and industry associations.
	Project Management: Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of technology projects, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards. Provide regular updates to senior management on project progress, risks, and issues.
	Vendor Management: Manage relationships with technology vendors, service providers, and third-party partners. Evaluate vendor proposals, negotiate contracts, and ensure compliance with service level agreements.
	Emerging Technologies: Stay abreast of emerging technologies, trends, and best practices in the finance and technology industries. Assess the potential impact of new technologies on business operations and recommend strategic investments.
	Talent Acquisition and Development: Lead recruitment efforts to attract top talent to the technology team. Develop and implement training programs to enhance technical skills, leadership capabilities, and industry knowledge among team members.
	Budgeting and Financial Management: Develop and manage the technology budget, ensuring optimal allocation of resources and cost-effective solutions. Monitor expenses, identify opportunities for cost savings, and justify technology investments to senior management.
	Risk Management: Identify potential risks and challenges during the software development life cycle. Develop mitigation strategies and contingency plans to minimize project risks.
	Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement initiatives within the development team. Encourage learning, skills enhancement, and the adoption of new technologies to enhance team performance.
	Any other tasks as assigned by the line manager.


Requirements


	A Bachelor&#39;s or Master&#39;s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Finance, or a related field is typically required.
	10+ years of experience in technology leadership roles, with a good background in the finance industry and/or technology solutions.
	Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Proven ability to inspire and motivate cross-functional teams, build consensus, and drive results in a dynamic environment.
	Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, C++, Python, or others. Knowledge of software development frameworks and tools, database systems, and web technologies is also important. Additionally, expertise in specific domains or technologies relevant to the organization&#39;s industry may be required.


Salary
N30,000,000 - N40,000,000 annually.&nbsp;

Method of Application
